SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication

Class TCPClientCommunication

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication.TCPClientCommunication
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientCommunication
public class TCPClientCommunication extends Object implements ClientCommunication
TCP based implementation of ClientCommunication uses a TCPClientConnection to send messages to the server
